channel.title: Problems... again PLZ Help me!
channel.description:
Ok this is my first problem:
[img]http://xs223.xs.to/xs223/08030/stupiderror722.jpg[/img]
It cant find it but i did that part of the tutoriul like 4 times and i changed the update number in 4 becuz i got jdka 6 u 4
Ok second problem:
[img]http://xs223.xs.to/xs223/08030/stupiderror2206.jpg[/img]
Its dutch but ill try to translate it :
He cant recognise javac as a internal or external, program or batch.

item.title: Problems... again PLZ Help me!
item.dc:creator: @You_Are_Sick You Are Sick
item.description:
@You_Are_Sick wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:2, topic:174737”]try

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end pause exit[/quote]
Thats a compiler right?
How do i replace it ?

Read full topic

item.title: Problems... again PLZ Help me!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

try

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end pause exit

Read full topic
